description: The Conservative Party of B.C. is calling for a public inquiry after a leaked provincial health ministry document brought to light the trafficking of government “safe supply” drugs. description: Liberal leadership candidates spent Thursday attempting to one-up each other over how quickly they’d meet NATO’s defence spending target.
